<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wand of Pernicious Poison](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2286)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
<trait label="Wand" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=164" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 141 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This wand is made of chitin, topped with a hooked barb that weeps droplets of foul-smelling, green fluid when you Activate the wand.

**Activate** <actions string="" /> Cast a Spell;  **Frequency** once per day, plus overcharge;   **Effect** You Cast a Spell determined by the wand's type. The poison the spell delivers gains the [virulent](/Traits.aspx?ID=162) trait.

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of _spider sting_ of the appropriate rank.  

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 4"
pfs="Standard"
>
Wand of Pernicious Poison (1st-Rank Spell)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 141 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 100 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The spell is [_spider sting_](/Spells.aspx?ID=300).

<title
level="2"
right="Item 14"
pfs="Standard"
>
Wand of Pernicious Poison (6th-Rank Spell)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 141 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 4,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The spell is 6th-rank _spider sting_, but it deals 3d6 damage on a touch or on a successful save, and delivers this poison. 

**Deadly Spider Venom** ([poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669), virulent) **Level** 11; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 3d6 poison damage and [enfeebled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=71) 2 (1 round); **Stage 2** 4d6 poison damage and enfeebled 2 (1 round); **Stage 3** 6d6 poison damage and enfeebled 2 (1 round)
name: Wand of Pernicious Poison
